summary: A collection of pytest fixtures and test suites that rigorously verify Kedro's I/O layer, covering dataset implementations (cached, lambda, memory, shared memory), versioning, caching, configuration resolution, serialization, and resource handling within the DataCatalog system.
business_intent: Ensure reliable and correct data handling, version control, and caching across Kedro's dataset abstractions so that data pipelines operate predictably and safely in production environments.
